title: S3cco
author: S3cco
content: Metaverse Summit | September 21-22, 2023 | Paris, FranceEvent Website: https://metaverse-summit.org/Metaverse Summit is set to explore and build the future of Metaverse together. The summit will gather builders, entrepreneurs, investors and experts from 3D, VFXGaming, VR, AR, Web3 and beyond.We believe that sharing and transmitting knowledge is the most sustainable way to develop the decentralized, fertile future of Metaverse.

comments.author: S3cco
comments.body: Metaverse New Era: Emerging Tech and Creativity to Take Center Stage at Metaverse Summit 2023 https://bitcoingarden.org/metaverse-new-era-emerging-tech-and-creativity-to-take-center-stage-at-metaverse-summit-2023/ The Metaverse Summit, a pioneering event at the forefront of technological advancements, is set to unveil a new era of possibilities in the metaverse landscape. This important event will take place from 21-22 September in Paris, and will bring together visionaries, innovators, and enthusiasts from around the world. The summit aims to shape the future of the metaverse.This landmark summit will showcase the latest breakthroughs in AI, mixed reality, and Web3 decentralization, combining cutting-edge technologies with boundless creativity to shape the future of digital experiences.The metaverse has become a focal point of global attention, drawing from recent news that highlights the convergence of artificial intelligence, mixed reality, and Web3 decentralization. As the world continues to embrace these emerging technologies, the Metaverse Summit emerges as a hub of exploration and collaboration for industry leaders, innovators, and creative minds alike....
